tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_pipeline ( 
    id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    source_id INT, 
    source_name STRING, 
    data_type STRING, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    transformed_data STRING, 
    loaded_flag BOOLEAN 
);

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   source_name VARCHAR(255),
   connection_details JSON
)

CREATE TABLE data_transformations (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   transformation_name VARCHAR(255),
   transformation_script TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE data_load (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   load_name VARCHAR(255),
   load_query TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ETL_Stage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source VARCHAR(50),
  data JSONB,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Data_Extract (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source VARCHAR(50),
  extract_date DATE,
  data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Data_Transform (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source VARCHAR(50),
  transform_date DATE,
  transformed_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Data_Load (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  destination VARCHAR(50),
  load_date DATE,
  loaded_data JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE pipeline_metadata_table (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pipeline_name VARCHAR,
    source_table_name VARCHAR,
    transform_table_name VARCHAR,
    load_table_name VARCHAR
);
